description:
An invisible man turns Nami`s bath time into a harrowing experience, and Usopp battles a hall full of haunted paintings with a handful of burning candles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nami Dai Pinch! Zombie Yashiki to Toumei Ningen
Nami en grand danger ! Le manoir des zombies et l`homme invisible
Nami`s in a Major Pinch! The Zombie Mansion and the Invisible Man!
Большие неприятности Нами! Особняк зомби и человек-невидимка
نامي في ورطة كبيرة! قصر الزّومبي والرّجل الخفيّ!
ナミ大ピンチ! ゾンビ屋敷と透明人間
